scripts.release:cut: git add . && git commit -m 'new release' && bun run deploy:one @astro-aws/infra -- PROD && bun run changeset publish && git push && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:prepare: bun run build && bun run synth && bun run changeset version && bun run format
scripts.changeset:version: bun run changeset version && bun run format
scripts.changeset:publish: bun run build && bun run deploy:one @astro-aws/infra -- PROD && bun run changeset tag && bun run changeset publish && git push --force --follow-tags origin HEAD:refs/heads/main
